original_text: And the Lord said unto me, Son of man, mark well, and behold with thine eyes, and hear with thine ears all that I say unto thee concerning all the ordinances of the house of the Lord, and all the laws thereof; and mark well the entering in of the house, with every going forth of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 인자야 너는 전심으로 주목하여 내가 네게 말하는 바 여호와의 성전의 모든 규례와 모든 율례를 귀로 듣고 또 성전의 입구와 성소의 출구를 전심으로 주목하고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto me
all that I say unto thee
concerning all the ordinances of the house of the Lord
and mark well the entering in of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 집으로 들어가는 것을 잘 보라

sentences.original_text: with every going forth of the sanctuary
